item.title: How I started loving LEGO again in my thirties
item.description: As much as I loved LEGOs during my childhood - I have to admit - I stopped caring about them as soon as I started growing up… and never thought much about them until very recently. I suspect this is common to many AFOL. Six years ago, I became father of the most wonderful little girl… No, that’s not when I re-discovered my passion for LEGOs; at the time, as you might guess, we haven’t much free time.
